Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Postage Stamp Cards" series (N85), issued in a set of 50 cards in 1889 to promote W. Duke Sons & Co. brand cigarettes. Each card hosts a real postage stamp from around the world pasted onto a printed scene related to sending, delivering, or receiving a letter.
